import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { logout } from "../Redux/Actions/userActions"; const Header = () => { const [keyword, setKeyword] = useState(''); const [showCreateButton, setShowCreateButton] = useState(true); const dispatch = useDispatch(); let navigate = useNavigate(); const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); const { cartItems } = cart; const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin); const { userInfo } = userLogin; const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logout()); }; const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (keyword.trim()) { navigate(`/search/${keyword}`); } else { navigate('/'); } }; const handleCreateButtonClick = () => { setShowCreateButton(false); }; return (
{/* Top Header */}

¡Envios a todo el país!

{/* Header */}
{/* MOBILE HEADER */}
{ userInfo ? (
Perfil Crear Producto Cerrar Sesión
) : (
Inicia Sesión Registrate
) } {cartItems.length}
setKeyword(e.target.value)} />
{/* PC HEADER */}
setKeyword(e.target.value)} />
{showCreateButton && (
Crear Producto
)} { userInfo ? (
Perfil Crear Producto Cerrar Sesión
) : (
Inicia Sesión Registrate
) } {cartItems.length}
); }; export default Header;
